name: My child born of war
description:
Imagine you are unmarried but you looking care a adopt a child or your child was born before your born how you take care with current life style.


Will you try to make all the right choices in an adopt girl to become a model kids ?

The original focus of the game was a role-play wherein players pretended to be either a parent adopting a child, or a child getting adopted by you,

but as the game help you developed further, its focus shifted to being about adopting and caring for a variety of different virtual Childs. Look for the effects of your choices in your child’s happiness, smart brain your care level.

To have access to the app content and functionality, you can choose between a lifetime, monthly and yearly auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
